<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bless Tonic](/Feats.aspx?ID=1175) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="General" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=78" />
<trait label="Positive" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=128" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 104 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4); deity who grants [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) divine font

</column>

---

You channel positive energy into restoratives that ward against harm. When you [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) an alchemical item that restores Hit Points (rather than create it with advanced alchemy, Quick Alchemy, or another means), it becomes a blessed alchemical item and gains the [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) trait. For example, an [elixir of life](/Equipment.aspx?ID=91) would become a blessed elixir of life. When a creature regains Hit Points using a blessed alchemical item, the overflowing energy grants them negative resistance 5 for 1 round, or negative resistance 10 if you are legendary in [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4).

prerequisite: Master in Crafting; deity who grants _heal_ divine font
